name: Sarah Lance from Arrow and Legends of Tomorrow
description:
By request! You could also just use "Caity Lotz" as a prompt in most models but this is a little more character specific.

All of my embeddings are trained with v1-5-pruned-emaonly with the vae-ft-mse-840000-ema-pruned.vae.pt VAE

Images use the consistentFactor_v3Light model.

meta.prompt: photo of (SarahLance:0.99) (Wearing a neon pink shirt with a silver metallic vest and a holographic jacket:1.4), detailed face, realistic skin, high quality, (bluegrey eyes:1.1), Leica 50mm, f1. 4, natural light, grainy, (high detailed skin:1.2), high detail
